atom

░░ \quad ( regexp )
░░ \quad any character exept \quad . \ ? $\star$ + { } ( ) | [ ]
░░ \quad . \quad (this means [^\n\r])
░░ \quad \ one of \quad n r t . \ ? $\star$ + { } ( ) | [ ] _ ^

more1

L opt one of \quad u l t m o

M opt one of \quad n c l

N opt one of \quad d l o

P opt one of \quad c d s e i f o

Z opt one of \quad s l p

S opt one of \quad m c k o

C opt one of \quad c f o n

Is normalized-block-name (e.g. "Latin-1Supplement")
